name: Bedding grout placed and finished as per project requirements
Bedding grout (trowelable) used is as per project specification (PHOTO REQUIRED of the grout bag)
Grout mixed in line with manufacturers recommendations
Grout bed sufficient to ensure full coverage (PHOTO REQUIRED of grout bed prior to landing element)
Element installed to (PHOTO REQUIRED to show survey pins and spirit level bubble):
Element propped as per Euro Precast PEDS (PHOTO REQUIRED of element propped)
Prop bolts installed with tool to ensure locking mechanism can't be removed by hand
Dowel tube (flowable) grout placed and finished as per project requirements
Dowel tube grout used is as per project specification (PHOTO REQUIRED of the grout bag)
Grout mixed in line with manufacturers recommendations
Dowel tubes filled to top of tubes
Is there any transport or erection damage that needs to be fixed (PHOTO REQUIRED of damaged area)
If there is damage, mark as FAIL.  Once the damage is repaired, take another photo (PHOTO REQUIRED) and then change the status to PASS
Area has been cleaned from grout and rubbish (PHOTO REQUIRED of the area before leaving)
